Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.game_board

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game_board.Cell
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
Describes the state of each of the 25 Cells composing the Board. Stores the x and y-coordinates, the build level, if the cell has a dome and the Worker standing on the Cell if present.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int buildLevel
    The current build level of the Cell.
    private boolean hasDome
    Set to true if the Cell has a dome.
    private int posX
    The x-coordinate of the Cell.
    private int posY
    The y-coordinate of the Cell.
    private Worker worker
    The Worker currently on the Cell (if present).

    Cell constructor.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Cell

      public Cell​(int posY, int posX)
      Cell constructor. Initializes a Cell, setting its x and y coordinates as the values received as arguments and all the other attributes to thei default values.
      Parameters:
      posY - the y-coordinate of the Cell
      posX - the x-coordinate of the Cell

      Returns:
      the building-level of the Cell

    • setBuildLevel

      public void setBuildLevel​(int buildLevel)
      Parameters:
      buildLevel - the building-level to set this Cell to

    • build

      public void build() throws IllegalBuildException
      Builds a level (in a range from 1 to 3) or a dome on the Cell.
      Throws:
      IllegalBuildException - when it's not possible to build on this Cell

    • isDomed

      public boolean isDomed()
      Returns:
      true if the Cell has a Dome, false otherwise

    • buildDome

      public void buildDome()
      Builds a Dome on the Cell.

    • getWorker

      public Worker getWorker()
      Returns:
      the Worker standing on the Cell

    • setWorker

      public void setWorker​(Worker worker)
      Sets the Cell as an occupied space (by the worker received as an argument).
      Parameters:
      worker - the Worker to set on this Cell

    • hasWorker

      public boolean hasWorker()
      Returns:
      true if the Cell is occupied by a Worker, false otherwise.
